Is multiple lentigines syndrome inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene in each cell is sufficient to cause the disorder.",GHR,multiple lentigines syndrome
What are the treatments for multiple lentigines syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of multiple lentigines syndrome:  - Cincinnati Children's Hospital: Cardiomyopathie
